com.interpss.core.aclf.impl.func

Class AclfNetBMatrixHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.interpss.core.aclf.impl.func.BaseAclfNetHelper
      • com.interpss.core.aclf.impl.func.AclfNetBMatrixHelper

  • public class AclfNetBMatrixHelper
extends BaseAclfNetHelper
    This class provides methods to form the B1 matrix for an AC load flow network. It extends the BaseAclfNetHelper class and provides specific implementations for calculating the B1 matrix based on the Jacobian matrix type (e.g., REDUCED_BMATRIX, FULL_BMATRIX).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.interpss.core.aclf.impl.func.BaseAclfNetHelper

    • Method Detail

      • formB1Matrix

        public ISparseEqnDouble formB1Matrix(JacobianMatrixType type)
                              throws InterpssException
        Forms the B1 matrix for the AC load flow network based on the specified Jacobian matrix type.
        Parameters:
        type - The Jacobian matrix type (e.g., REDUCED_BMATRIX, FULL_BMATRIX).
        Returns:
        The B1 matrix as an ISparseEqnDouble object.
        Throws:
        InterpssException - if the bus numbers are not arranged or if any bus B1ii is zero.

      • formB11Matrix

        public ISparseEqnDouble formB11Matrix(JacobianMatrixType type)
                               throws InterpssException
        Forms the B11 matrix for the AC load flow network based on the specified Jacobian matrix type.
        Parameters:
        type - The Jacobian matrix type (e.g., REDUCED_BMATRIX, FULL_BMATRIX).
        Returns:
        The B11 matrix as an ISparseEqnDouble object.
        Throws:
        InterpssException - if the bus numbers are not arranged or if any bus B11ii is zero.
